about_the_game:
Nora’s AdventurEscape: Combination of brain puzzles, escape rooms, finding hidden objects, and magnificent decorations!

A touching life story... and a fresh new beginning!

Nora is a professional figure skater, even a winner of an Olympic gold medal.
During one especially unlucky performance, a peculiar accident happened... and Nora ended up in the hospital with her leg broken. Sadly, that injury made it impossible for her to continue skating... She was desperate and eager to escape to a new adventurous journey by finding new meaning in life... and maybe even true love?
Wiping her tears off, the very moment the cast was taken off her leg, she headed off to the hometown of her idol - famous figure skater Greta - where she's about to meeet some interesting people - and experience fabulous adventures with unpredictable plot twists!

What is Nora‘s AdventurEscape, you ask? Is it just another puzzle, escape rooms game, hidden objects game, or adventures game with 100 doors to unlock? Scroll to find out!

Are you a code finder and do you like crazy brainstorming games? Your favorites are 100 doors, finding hidden objects, and escape room games? But you would also like to create and decorate while following a thrilling journey through good storytelling? Then Nora’s AdventurEscape is exactly what you need!

Nora's AdventurEscape features:

⛸️ DISCOVER a beautiful town and EXPLORE it for thrilling adventures and unpredictable plot twists.
⛸️ SOLVE over 100 challenging PUZZLES that test your logical thinking and observation skills.
⛸️ UNLOCK over 100 doors and FIND hidden objects behind open doors.
⛸️ Find the right code and the objects to OPEN THE DOOR!
⛸️ RENOVATE homes and combine different decorative objects throughout the magnificent town.
⛸️ Search the ESCAPE ROOMS for HIDDEN OBJECTS while solving PUZZLES!
⛸️ Follow a heartwarming STORY, so jump in and help Nora escape from her old life.
⛸️ A Combination, of different escape rooms games, hidden objects challenges, and LOGICAL variations of puzzles.
⛸️ DECORATE the town's houses, the town square, and other places.
⛸️ Experience fun ESCAPE ROOMS!

Use your skills to complete and escape all 100+ enigmatic rooms on Nora’s adventurous journey.
During solving these exciting puzzles and searching for hidden objects through the rooms, give the small town a complete makeover. Tickle your brain with puzzles and join Nora on her escape trip.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.14
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz (INTEL ONLY)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.14
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz (INTEL ONLY)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Nora's AdventurEscape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Do you seek an adventure? Maybe an escape from daily struggles? Find hidden objects, solve puzzles and escape rooms.
